author: 卿卿～ Hwaiting😘
text: If asking whether or not they got the development plan for me. The answer is no. Im a living evidence for their so-call plan. I questioned them, became a trial version then see how it works on me...

author: 卿卿～ Hwaiting😘
text: Try to fill up my calendar with as much as possible dating and hanging out with friends... to have something to wait for and to make myself feel that time will go faster

author: 卿卿～ Hwaiting😘
text: Try not to blame anything on anyone, Khanh. You always have a choice...

author: 卿卿～ Hwaiting😘
text: Pls do not try to attack anyone back. The way they didn't respect you. It doesn't reflect your personality. Keep your value up. Keep your head up. Dont need to stay strong everytime. What you need is a thoughtful mind...

author: 卿卿～ Hwaiting😘
text: I will consider myself having no boss at the time being. I will take care of myself and protect myself from here... I know they are just trying to take advantage of me. Let it be. Focus on yourself Khanh, get the thing done and leave...

author: 卿卿～ Hwaiting😘
text:
Khanh, are you ok? 
No, I'm not
